Kin-iro Mosaic / Kin'iro Mosaic / Kiniro Mosaic / Kinmosa / Kinmoza! / This show has too many title variations

Video: BD 1280x720 4:4:4 10-bit H.264
Audio: Japanese 2.0 AAC, Japanese Commentary 2.0 AAC (unsubbed)
Subtitles: English ASS

Dialogue translation from Crunchyroll, edited and with a few bits borrowed from IB
OP/ED translation and typesetting from FFF's BD release with IB's script

This release uses ordered chapter segment linking, so you'll need the OP and ED files for them to appear within the episodes.

To use the commentary audio, first move it to the same folder as the video files. In MPC-HC's options, enable its internal audio switcher if it isn't already. Open the video, go to Play > Audio and select the commentary audio.
